attributes.action: introduce photo & chip ID cards to all UK nationals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's about time we stopped listening to the human rights and liberal namby pambies. I served in the forces and carried an id all the time. 
ID cards are only a problem if you have something to fear or hide - plus with bio metric data help prevent benefit scroungers upto terrorism.
If any immigrants have a problem they can go home to their countries - usually no human rights at all.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
